lead_paragraph: The company reported a 21 percent decline in first-quarter earnings for the first quarter, though operating earnings per share were above estimates.

headline.print_headline: IBM Shows Progress in New Businesses
headline.main: IBM Results Show Progress in Cloud and Data Analysis

snippet: The company reported a 21 percent decline in first-quarter earnings for the first quarter, though operating earnings per share were above estimates.
abstract: IBM reports first-quarter profit of $2.3 billion, or $2.35 a share, down 21 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue fell 5 percent to $18.7 billion; performance highlights how company is gaining in new businesses like cloud computing and data analysis, but is still struggling as its older lines decline faster than new ones can grow.
